title: Sadhu Images
description:
Sadhu pictures. I find sadhus to be very inspiring and interesting, and over the years I have collected many pictures, which I am uploading here. Despite what many think of these holy men and women (that they are fakes and pose for tourist dollars), I have to respect a society that allows people to wander around naked and smoking ganja in public, all for the sake of God. Such freedom that, despite India's many social problems, makes our so-called freedom here in the USA pale in comparison.
Most of these pictures have been found on various travel blogs. While I am wary of trying to determine what sadhu is â€œrealâ€ or a tourist prop, I did eliminate many pictures of a small handful of painted clowns that hang out in Kathmandu and Varanasi. 
My main interest is to see what sadhus carry when they travel, how they camp, etc.
There are some 8,365 images in 18 folders. I have worked hard to eliminate duplicates, 
but that's not easy. 
No Mohammedans, no Sikhs, no Jains but maybe a few pilgrims or Baals might have sneaked in.
Hope someone enjoys these...
(This is a repost of this torrent, the former one became corrupted)
